thread.title: S Howat - Ayrshire
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by S Howat - Ayrshire

author: S Howat - Ayrshire
title: S Howat - Ayrshire
text: From my initial research into my problem and viewing a YouTube clip, to the phone call I made to get advice and the unbelievable customer service (both professional and highly proficient) I received, ShowerDoctor have been superb. You clearly have a system that works. Nothing short of first class, and I have already recommended the name to my DIY minded friends just in the off chance they need assistance. Thank you!
